mapper.select: select father.id as id, father.name as name, father.type as type, father.father_id as fatherId, child.id as subId, child.name as subName, child.type as subType, child.father_id as subFatherId from category father left join category child on father.id = child.father_id where father.father_id = #{rootCatId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
